member.name: M:Owin.AppBuilderExtensions.MaxBandwidth(Owin.IAppBuilder,System.Int32)
member.summary: Limits the bandwith used by the subsequent stages in the owin pipeline.
member.param: The maximum number of bytes per second to be transferred. Use 0 or a negative number to specify infinite bandwidth.

member.name: M:Owin.AppBuilderExtensions.MaxBandwidth(Owin.IAppBuilder,System.Func{System.Int32})
member.summary: Limits the bandwith used by the subsequent stages in the owin pipeline.
member.param: A delegate to retrieve the maximum number of bytes per second to be transferred. Allows you to supply different values at runtime. Use 0 or a negative number to specify infinite bandwidth.

member.name: M:Owin.AppBuilderExtensions.MaxConcurrentRequests(Owin.IAppBuilder,System.Int32)
member.summary: Limits the number of concurrent requests that can be handled used by the subsequent stages in the owin pipeline.
member.param: The maximum number of concurrent requests. Use 0 or a negative number to specify unlimited number of concurrent requests.

member.name: M:Owin.AppBuilderExtensions.MaxConcurrentRequests(Owin.IAppBuilder,System.Func{System.Int32})
member.summary: Limits the number of concurrent requests that can be handled used by the subsequent stages in the owin pipeline.
member.param: A delegate to retrieve the maximum number of concurrent requests. Allows you to supply different values at runtime. Use 0 or a negative number to specify unlimited number of concurrent requests.

member.name: M:Owin.AppBuilderExtensions.ConnectionTimeout(Owin.IAppBuilder,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Timeouts the connection if there hasn't been an read read activity on the request body stream or any write activity on the response body stream.

member.name: M:Owin.AppBuilderExtensions.ConnectionTimeout(Owin.IAppBuilder,System.Func{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Timeouts the connection if there hasn't been an read read activity on the request body stream or any write activity on the response body stream.
member.param: A delegate to retrieve the timeout timespan. Allows you to supply different values at runtime.
